quote: Pain is inevitable, but misery is optional.
author: Tim Hansel

quote: To avoid criticism, do nothing, say nothing, be nothing.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Believe and act as if it were impossible to fail.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: Never get out of the boat. Absolutely goddamn right. Unless you were goin' all the way.
author: Captain Willard

quote: Nobody can make you feel inferior without your consent.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair

quote: Success is going from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: If there is no struggle, there is no progress.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: There are no short cuts to any place worth going.
author: Beverly Sills

quote: In each business, we have two strands: the day-to-day, and the future group thinking, 'How do I disrupt myself?' The people running it can't be the same ones thinking about its disruption.
author: Martin Reeves

quote: No person will have occasion to complain of the want of time who never loses any.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: The most common form of despair is not being who you are.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.
author: Roger Staubach

quote: Do it trembling if you must, but do it!
author: Emmet Fox

quote: Money is, in some respects, like fire. It is a very excellent servant, but a terrible master.
author: P. T. Barnum

quote: If you don't go after what you want, you'll never have it. If you don't ask, the answer is always no. If you don't step forward, you're always in the same place.
author: Nora Roberts

quote: And it is awfully hard to come up with those ideas if you don't have any time to think.
author: Paul B. Brown

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Every next level of your life will demand a different version of you.
author: Unknown

quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: Obsessed is just a word the lazy use to describe the dedicated.
author: Russell Warren

quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind.
author: Bernard M. Baruch

quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: If you aren’t going all the way, why go at all?
author: Joe Namath

quote: The dreamers are the saviors of the world.
author: James Allen

quote: One thing modeling taught me is that the spotlight can change everything.
author: Liya Kebede

quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Very often a change of self is needed more than a change of scene.
author: Arthur Christopher Benson

quote: You must do what others don't to achieve what others won't.
author: Les Brown

quote: I don't know who my grandfather was; I am much more concerned to know what his grandson will be.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: If you have everything under control, you’re not moving fast enough.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: You've got to bumble forward into the unknown.
author: Frank Gehry

quote: How Everyone you Will Ever Meet Knows Something that You Don't.
author: Bill Nye

quote: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Learn from yesterday, live for today, look to tomorrow, rest this afternoon.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
author: John Muir

quote: Forever is composed of nows.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Always make a total effort, even when the odds are against you.
author: Arnold Palmer

quote: If you can’t outplay them, outwork them.
author: Ben Hogan

quote: When you come to a roadblock, take a detour.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Do what you can, where you are, with what you have.
author: Teddy Roosevelt

quote: Even if you’re on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: Life's simple. You make choices and you don't look back.
author: Han

quote: Light tomorrow with today.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: I will go anywhere as long as it is forward.
author: David Livingston

quote: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
author: Jimmy Johnson

quote: Don't live the same day over and over again and call that a life.
author: Germany Kent

quote: When you talk, you are only repeating what you already know. But if you listen, you may learn something new.
author: The Dalai Lama

quote: If you have some power, then your job is to empower somebody else.
author: Toni Morrison

quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

quote: The price of anything is the amount of life you exchange for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: It does not do to leave a live dragon out of your calculations, if you live near him.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien, The Hobbit or There and Back Again

quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
author: Dr. Robert Schuller

quote: The more I want to get something done, the less I call it work.
author: Richard Bach

quote: A person who is nice to you, but rude to the waiter, is not a nice person.
author: Dave Barry

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: Try not. Do, or do not. There is no try.
author: Yoda

quote: Our dreams feel real while we're in them. It's only when we wake we realize things were strange
author: Cobb, Inception

quote: The gateway skill to good time management is when you ask not just what you need to do, but how long it will take.
author: Julie Morgenstern

quote: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: Waking up this morning, I smile. 24 brand new hours are before me. I vow to live fully in each moment.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Sell a man a fish, he eats for a day. Teach a man how to fish, you ruin a wonderful business opportunity.
author: Karl Marx

quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
author: Gandhi

quote: A year from now you may wish you had started today.
author: Karen Lamb

quote: If you don’t build your dreams, someone will hire you to build theirs.
author: Tony Gaskins

quote: You must be the person you have never had the courage to be. Gradually, you will discover that you are that person, but until you can see this clearly, you must pretend and invent.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: The road to Easy Street goes through the sewer.
author: John Madden

quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
author: Gary Player

quote: Just keep going. Everybody gets better if they keep at it.
author: Ted Williams

quote: 'What day is it?' asked Pooh. 'It’s today,' squeaked Piglet. 'My favorite day,' said Pooh.
author: A.A. Milne

quote: The competitor to be feared is one who never bothers about you at all, but goes on making his own business better all the time.
author: Henry Ford

quote: People love to buy, they don't like to be sold.
author: Matthew Pollard

quote: Few "great" ideas come from an individual; instead, they’re gradually expanded on and improved by a team or network of individuals.
author: Jayson DeMers

quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
author: E.E. Cummings

quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you can never see the shadow.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Look at everything always as though you were seeing it either for the first or last time: Thus is your time on earth filled with glory.
author: Betty Smith

quote: Don’t downgrade your dream just to fit your reality.
author: Stuart Scott

quote: The trick is to enjoy life. Don't wish away your days, waiting for better ones ahead.
author: Marjorie Pay Hinckley

quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: There is only one success: to be able to spend your life in your own way.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: Life is beautiful, as long as it consumes you.
author: Socrates

quote: Make each day your masterpiece.
author: John Wooden

quote: Never let your memories be greater than your dreams.
author: Doug Ivester

quote: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay

quote: The best time to plant a tree was twenty years ago, the second-best time is right now.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: I think laziness is a cardinal sin -- not in the sense that you should always keep busy, but in the sense that if you have the potential to create something that can be useful to others, then you should do everything you can to make it happen.
author: François Chollet

quote: Do what you love and the money will follow.
author: Marsha Sinetar

quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Every morning, I imagine creating a new business that needs to be sold by the end of the day. I better hustle today!
author: Manuel Amuantegui, Finding Motivation in Unusual Places

quote: The highest profits are made in trades that show a profit right from the start.
author: Jesse Livermore

quote: Fact is, no one cares about your marketing goals. But everyone likes a good story.
author: Shane Snow

quote: It is much more difficult to judge oneself than to judge others. If you succeed in judging yourself rightly, then you are indeed a man of true wisdom.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: The first principle is that you must not fool yourself and you are the easiest person to fool.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: The best dreams happen when you’re awake.
author: Cherie Gilderbloom

quote: Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: I'm sure the universe is full of intelligent life. It's just been too intelligent to come here.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: Don’t wish it were easier, wish you were better.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Out yonder there was this huge world, which exists independently of us human beings and which stands before us like a great, eternal riddle, at least partially accessible to our inspection and thinking. The contemplation of this world beckoned like a liberation…
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Life is beautiful, so long as it is consuming you. When it is rushing through you, destroying you, life is glorious. It is best to roar away, like a fire with a great draught, white-hot to the last bit.
author: D.H. Lawrence

quote: I offer you peace. I offer you love. I offer you friendship. I see your beauty. I hear your need. I feel your feelings.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: When we are mindful, deeply in touch with the present moment, our understanding of what is going on deepens, and we begin to be filled with acceptance, joy, peace and love.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Only he who can see the invisible can do the impossible.
author: Frank L. Gaines

quote: “There’s no way around hard work. Embrace it. You have to put in the hours because there is always something you can improve on”
author: Roger Federer

quote: The man who has no imagination has no wings.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: “Gold medals aren’t really made of gold. They’re made of sweat, determination, and a hard-to-find alloy called guts.”
author: Dan Gable

quote: Today, you have 100% of your life left.
author: Tom Landry

quote: “You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take. A good hockey player plays where the puck is. A great hockey player plays where the puck is going to be.”
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: A trophy carries dust. Memories last forever.
author: Mary Lou Retton

quote: “People say to me all the time, ‘You have no fear.’ I tell them, ‘No, that’s not true. I’m scared all the time. You have to have fear in order to have courage. I’m a courageous person because I’m a scared person.”
author: Ronda Rousey

quote: Age is no barrier. It’s a limitation you put on your mind.
author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quote: “Champions aren’t made in gyms. Champions are made from something they have deep inside of them; a desire, a dream, a vision.”
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: The only way to prove that you’re a good sport is to lose.
author: Ernie Banks

quote: “Dreams are free. Goals have a cost. While you can daydream for free, goals don’t come without a price. Time, Effort, Sacrifice, and Sweat. How will you pay for your goals?"
author: Usain Bolt

quote: It is not the size of a man but the size of his heart that matters.
author: Evander Holyfield

quote: “I can only control my performance. If I do my best, then I can feel good at the end of the day.”
author: Michael Phelps

quote: The more difficult the victory, the greater the happiness in winning.
author: Pele

quote: “Preparation is everything and focus is the key. It’s easy to say you gave it your all out on the pitch. But the point is if you’d prepared you’d have had more to give and you’ve played better.”
author: Eric Cantona

quote: One man practicing sportsmanship is far better than 50 preaching it.
author: Knute Rockne

quote: “The harder I work, the luckier I get.”
author: Gary Player

quote: You have to expect things of yourself before you can do them.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: “Hard work beats talent when talent fails to work hard.”
author: Kevin Durant

quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: “I’ve missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I’ve been trusted to take the game-winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.”
author: Michael Jordan

quote: If you have everything under control, you’re not moving fast enough.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: “Obstacles don’t have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don’t turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.”
author: Michael Jordan

quote: You can’t put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get.
author: Michael Phelps

quote: “The minute you get away from fundamentals – whether its proper technique, work ethic or mental preparation – the bottom can fall out of your game, your schoolwork, your job, whatever you’re doing.”
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Always make a total effort, even when the odds are against you.
author: Arnold Palmer

quote: “It’s what you learn after you think you know it all that really counts.”
author: John Wooden

quote: If it doesn’t challenge you, it won’t change you.
author: Fred Devito

quote: “Good teams become great ones when the members trust each other enough to surrender the Me for the We.”
author: Phil Jackson

quote: Victory is in having done your best. If you’ve done your best, you’ve won.
author: Billy Bowerman

quote: “No judgment of your practice, just practice.”
author: Gary Olson

quote: The key is not the will to win. Everybody has that. It is the will to prepare to win that is important.
author: Bobby Knight

quote: “If you hear a voice within you say ‘you cannot paint,’ then by all means paint, and that voice will be silenced.”
author: Vincent van Gogh

quote: A champion is afraid of losing. Everyone else is afraid of winning.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: “Adversity causes some men to break; others to break records.”
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: If you are afraid of failure you don’t deserve to be successful!
author: Charles Barkley

quote: “Successful people have fear, successful people have doubts, and successful people have worries. They just don’t let these feelings stop them.”
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: Today I will do what others won’t, so tomorrow I can accomplish what others can’t.
author: Jerry Rice

quote: “The way to develop self-confidence is to do the thing you fear and get a record of successful experiences behind you.”
author: William Jennings Bryan

quote: What do you do with a mistake: recognize it, admit it, learn from it, forget it.
author: Dean Smith

quote: “You wouldn’t worry so much about what others think of you if you realised how seldom they do.”
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: You can’t get much done in life if you only work on the days when you feel good.
author: Jerry West

quote: “Multitasking is seriously overrated. Try to do one task at a time and learn to do it with more purpose. “
author: Gareth J. Mole

quote: I’ve got a theory that if you give 100% all of the time, somehow things will work out in the end.
author: Larry Bird

quote: “A competition is a normal performance on a special day.”
author: Jonah Oliver

quote: Do not let what you can not do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

quote: “Listen to everyone because even an idiot will have a good idea once or twice in their life. Then evaluate and pick out what works for you and commit to it.”
author: James Kneller

quote: There may be people that have more talent than you, but there’s no excuse for anyone to work harder than you do.
author: Derek Jeter

quote: “We have this thing in our mind of I gotta feel perfect, calm and confident and THEN I’ll perform well. Mate, if that’s the case you’re going to perform well a very, very small portion of the time.”
author: Peter Clarke

quote: You have to do something in your life that is honorable and not cowardly if you are to live in peace with yourself.
author: Larry Brown

quote: “I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens.”
author: Woody Allen

quote: Some people are in such utter darkness that they will burn you just to see a light. Try not to take it personally.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: “Someone who smiles too much with you can sometime frown too much with you at your back.”
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: “To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure.”
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: “I'm the one that's got to die when it's time for me to die, so let me live my life the way I want to.”
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: “The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time.”
author: Mark Twain

quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
author: Mae West

quote: “Death ends a life, not a relationship.”
author: Mitch Albom

quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
author: Robert Frost

quote: “A thing is not necessarily true because a man dies for it.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “It is said that your life flashes before your eyes just before you die. That is true, it's called Life.”
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
author: Andre Gide

quote: “I don't want to die without any scars.”
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: “Unbeing dead isn't being alive.”
author: E. E. Cummings

quote: Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
author: Mark Twain

quote: “When people don't express themselves, they die one piece at a time.”
author: Laurie Halse Anderson

quote: Life is what happens to us while we are making other plans.
author: Allen Saunders

quote: “Older men declare war. But it is youth that must fight and die.”
author: Herbert Hoover

quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: “I could die for you. But I couldn't, and wouldn't, live for you.”
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: “The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death.”
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: “It is nothing to die. It is frightful not to live.”
author: Victor Hugo

quote: I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens.
author: Woody Allen

quote: “Each night, when I go to sleep, I die. And the next morning, when I wake up, I am reborn.”
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Sleep, those little slices of death — how I loathe them.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: “Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.”
author: Albert Einstein

quote: “Who are you to judge the life I live? I know I'm not perfect -and I don't live to be- but before you start pointing fingers... make sure you hands are clean!”
author: Bob Marley

quote: "War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength.”
author: George Orwell

quote: Appear weak when you are strong, and strong when you are weak.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: “Only the dead have seen the end of war.”
author: Plato

quote: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: “If you win, you need not have to explain...If you lose, you should not be there to explain!”
author: Adolf Hitler

quote: Never think that war, no matter how necessary, nor how justified, is not a crime.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: “Imagination is the only weapon in the war against reality.”
author: Lewis Carroll

quote: Sometimes you have to pick the gun up to put the Gun down.
author: Malcom X
